name: opengov-mcp-server
description: MCP server that enables a client, such as Claude Desktop, to access open government data through Socrata APIs

scripts.prebuild-check: echo '--- Checking SDK installation ---' && npm ls @modelcontextprotocol/sdk && echo '--- Listing SDK dist contents (recursive, full path) ---' && ls -R "$(npm root)/@modelcontextprotocol/sdk/dist" && echo '--- SDK package.json ---' && cat "$(npm root)/@modelcontextprotocol/sdk/package.json" && echo '--- Listing all SDK files (full paths) ---' && find "$(npm root)/@modelcontextprotocol/sdk" -type f && echo '--- End Check ---'
scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run prebuild-check && npm run build:tsc

author: Scott Robbin <scott@robbin.co>
